CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The corresponding open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( I SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and PCE of the devices are also summarized in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

1. open-circuit voltage (Voc) - Voc is a property of a solar cell or photovoltaic device, and it is a measure of the maximum voltage that can be generated by the cell when it is not connected to a load.
2. short-circuit current (Isc) - Isc is a property of a solar cell or photovoltaic device, and it is a measure of the maximum current that can be generated by the cell when it is short-circuited (i.e., when the voltage across the cell is zero).
3. fill factor (FF) - FF is a measure of the quality of a solar cell or photovoltaic device. It is defined as the ratio of the maximum power that can be delivered by the cell to the product of the open-circuit voltage and short-circuit current.
4. PCE - PCE stands for power conversion efficiency, which is a measure of the efficiency with which a solar cell or photovoltaic device converts sunlight into electrical energy.

None of these entities are "material names" in the traditional sense, as they are properties or characteristics of solar cells or photovoltaic devices, rather than being names of specific materials. However, it is possible that the devices being referred to in the paragraph are made of specific materials, in which case those materials would be "material names." Without additional context, it is not possible to identify any specific material names in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

As mentioned earlier, none of the entities in the paragraph are "material names" in the traditional sense. They are all properties or characteristics of solar cells or photovoltaic devices. Therefore, there are no "irrelevant entities" to remove from the list.

If there are specific materials mentioned in the paragraph or in the surrounding text that are relevant to the discussion of the properties and characteristics of the solar cells or photovoltaic devices, then those materials would be "material names" and could be identified as such. However, based on the information provided in the paragraph, it is not possible to identify any specific material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Since there are no "material names" in the paragraph, there is no table to present. Here is a table with an empty column for "Material Name" to illustrate this:

| Material Name |
| --- |
|  |

If there are specific materials mentioned in the paragraph or in the surrounding text that are relevant to the discussion of the properties and characteristics of the solar cells or photovoltaic devices, then those materials would be "material names" and could be identified as such. In that case, a table with the identified material names could be presented as follows:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Material 1 |
| Material 2 |
| Material 3 |
| ... |

However, based on the information provided in the paragraph, it is not possible to identify any specific material names.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The corresponding open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( I SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and PCE of the devices are also summarized in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

1. Open-circuit voltage (Voc)
2. Short-circuit current (Isc)
3. Fill factor (FF)
4. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are properties or characteristics of the devices being discussed.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Open-circuit voltage (Voc)
2. Short-circuit current (Isc)
3. Fill factor (FF)
4. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)

These are the "Material Property" entities in the given paragraph. They are properties or characteristics of the devices being discussed. Other entities like "Figure 3" are not material properties, but rather refer to a figure in the document.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Open-circuit voltage (Voc) |
| Short-circuit current (Isc) |
| Fill factor (FF) |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
